Name: Metadata file identifier
Definition: unique identifier for this metadata file

Name: Metadata language
Definition: language used for documenting metadata

Name: Metadata character set
Definition: full name of the character coding standard used for the metadata set

Name: Metadata file parent identifier
Definition: file identifier of the metadata to which this metadata is a subset (child)

Name: Metadata hierarchy level
Definition:
scope to which the metadata applies
[options = attribute, attributeType, collectionHardware, collectionSession, dataset, series, nonGeographicDataset, dimensionGroup, feature, featureType, propertyType, fieldSession, software, service, model, tile, modelSession, documentProfile, dataRepository, codeList, project]

Name: Metadata hierarchy level name
Definition: name of the hierarchy levels for which the metadata is provided

Name: Metadata contact individual name
Definition: name of the responsible person

Name: Metadata contact organisation
Definition: name of the responsible organisation

Name: Metadata contact position
Definition: name of the responsible position

Name: Metadata contact role
Definition: function performed by the responsible party

Name: Metadata date stamp
Definition: data that the metadata was created

Name: Resource title
Definition: name by which the cited resource is known

Name: Resource reference date
Definition: reference date for the cited resource

Name: Resource reference date type
Definition:
event used for the reference date
[options: creation, publication, revision]

Name: Abstract describing the resource
Definition: brief narrative summary of the content of the resource(s)

Name: Resource language
Definition: language(s) used within the resource

Name: Resource character set
Definition: full name of the character coding standard used for the resource

Name: Topic category
Definition:
main theme(s) of the dataset
[options: farming, biota, boundaries, climatology / meteorology / atmosphere, economy, elevation, environment, geoscientific information, health, imagery / base maps / earth cover, intelligence / military, inland waters, location, oceans, planning / cadastre, society, transportation, utilities / communication]

Name: Geographic location of the resource (by description)
Definition: identifier used to represent a geographic area

Name: West longitude
